Every year, I hear from constituents about how rising drug prices are straining their finances and making them fear for their future.

Enough is enough. Lowering drug prices isn't a partisan issue ‚Äî it's about putting people over pharmaceutical profits and doing the right thing.

Today, @RepAndyKimNJ, @RepHaleyStevens & I introduced the Capping Drug Costs for Seniors Act to protect Medicare beneficiaries from burdensome out-of-pocket costs.

Our bill will push drug companies and insurers to pay their fair share & save seniors thousands of dollars a year.

Congrats to my friend and former colleague Jeff Flake on being nominated as Ambassador to Turkey ‚Äì I appreciate Jeff‚Äôs continued dedication to public service and I look forward to confirming him into this new role. https://twitter.com/jeffflake/status/1415038920807501825 QT @JeffFlake https://medium.com/@JeffFlake/nomination-to-be-u-s-ambassador-to-the-republic-of-turkey-e95a31d3ea53

From 2012 - 2017, Medicare drug prices soared at nearly 10x the rate of inflation. 

Without a cap on out-of-pocket costs for Medicare Part D, seniors are struggling to make ends meet. After spending their working lives paying into Medicare, they deserve better.

Big pharma needs to be held accountable for price-gouging working families. 

That's why @EleanorNorton, @RepRaskin, @RepSpanberger and I introduced the #SPIKEAct to require drug manufacturers to publicly justify price hikes to lawmakers and the public.

For years, big pharma has hiked the prices of drugs (and made record profits) while families struggle to foot the bill.

In the wealthiest country on earth, no one should have to choose between putting food on the table and getting the medications they need to stay alive.

In 2013, I had heart surgery ‚Äî and since then, just like millions of Americans, I‚Äôve needed to take daily medications to stay healthy for my family.

I know that drug prices are too high. Today, I introduced two bills to fix that (THREAD).
